tooltip_ability_polyplusstatic.English: This unit cannot become a veteran.
tooltip_ability_polyplusstatic.Portuguese (Brazil): Esta unidade não pode se tornar veterana.
tooltip_ability_polyplusstatic.Russian: Этот отряд не может получить звание ветерана.
tooltip_ability_polyplusstatic.Italian (Italy): Questa unità non può diventare veterana.
tooltip_ability_polyplusstatic.French (France): Cette unité ne peut pas devenir vétéran.

tooltip_ability_skate.English: This unit gets is limited to 1 movement and all other abilities if not being on ice.
tooltip_ability_skate.Russian: Этот отряд теряет все способности и имеет пониженое передвижение до 1 клетки когда не находится на льду.

tooltip_ability_waterembark.English: Allows land units to move on water and to turn into boats.
tooltip_ability_waterembark.Portuguese (Brazil): Permite que unidades terrestres se movam na água e se transformem em barcos.
tooltip_ability_waterembark.Russian: Позволяет сухопутным отрядам двигатся на воду и превращатся в лодки.
tooltip_ability_waterembark.Italian (Italy): Permette alle unità terrestri di muoversi sull'acqua e trasformarsi in barche.
tooltip_ability_waterembark.French (France): Permet aux unités terrestres de se déplacer sur l'eau et de se transformer en bateaux.
tooltip_ability_waterembark.Spanish (Mexico): Permite que las unidades terrestres se muevan en el agua y se conviertan en barcos.

building_ability_halved.English: Level of this building is halved and rounded down.
building_ability_halved.Russian: Уровень этого здания уменьшен вдвое и округлен в меньшую сторону.

tooltip.ability.embassy.English: Allow construction of Embassies in foreign capitals. Embassies provide income for both parties as long as they are not at war.

diplomacy.establishedembassy.description.English: You have established an embassy in the {0} capital. It will give you both {1} stars per turn.
{0} established an embassy in your capital. It will give you both {1} stars per turn.
